EmailTemplate.name: 201809_Global_TFE731 Exchanges_Part 145 Repair Stations_JRD.201809_Global_TFE731
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Certified TFE731 Engines Available for Sale
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Attention repair stations!
Honeywell’s TFE731 certified engine exchange program helps your customers get another couple trips or even a couple more years out of their aircraft by offering several different options and price points to fit their budget.
Purchase a TFE731 outright or exchange your customer’s TFE731 engine with Honeywell – it’s that simple.
When you exchange your customer’s TFE731 engine, your customer will receive a minimum core value for their trade-in. Plus, they’ll receive up to a one year warranty on the purchased engine and we’ll pay for shipping both ways.
Browse our certified, pre-owned TFE731 inventory and choose the engine that’s right for your customer today.
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
